titleStmt.title: An apology for the royal party: written in a letter to a person of the late Councel of State. / By a lover of peace and of his country. With a touch at the pretended plea for the army.
titleStmt.author: Evelyn, John, 1620-1706.

notesStmt.note: "A lover of peace and of his country" = John Evelyn.
Apparently a later edition of Wing E3481. In this state A3 is missigned "A2".
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
